author: topix.com
title: Raven-Symon © has issues with 'ghetto' names - KOTA-TV Rapid City
text:
There are 1 comment on the KOTA-TV Rapid City story from 12 hrs ago, titled Raven-Symon has issues with 'ghetto' names . In it, KOTA-TV Rapid City reports that:
Various studies have found black people experience negative treatment based not only on the color of their skin, but even their names. Those findings got an unexpected endorsement this week from a black celebrity with, as one columnist put it, "quite possibly the single blackest name in pop culture today."
Join the discussion below, or Read more at KOTA-TV Rapid City.
